metadata.title: CVE-2015-3935 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.5and 3.6 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe Business Search (search_nom) field to (1) htdocs/societe/societe.php or(2) htdocs/societe/admin/societe.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3935` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.7+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.7+dfsg1-1').
